author: Kashmira Gander
title: Remdesivir Eases Covid-19 Symptoms in Monkeys in 12 Hours, Small Preliminary Study Shows
description: There is currently no specific treatment for COVID-19.
content:
Remdesivir, an experimental drug which scientists hope could be used to treat COVID-19, appeared to improve coronavirus symptoms and reduce lung damage in a preliminary study on monkeys.
Scientists infected two groups of six rhesus macaque monkeys with SARS-… [+10887 chars]
